official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Mint for fiscal years 1985 and 1986, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Authorizes appropriations for FY 1985 and 1986 to the Bureau of the Mint for costs of the mint and assay offices. Authorizes appropriations to the Department of the Treasury for salaries and benefits for U.S. Mint employees for FY 1985. Limits expenditures from the coinage metal fund to a specified amount in any fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the United States Mint for fiscal years 1985 and 1986, and for other purposes.
